pages.text: Yesterday was a lot of work getting down to bedrock! I am glad I made the decission to venture so deep. I was able to find lots of ores and various stone. I was grateful I found Wolframite so I could made some really good tools only after a few days!$(br2)Wolframite allowed me to make a Tungsten-Carbide Hammer and also an Excavator.
The Tungsten-Carbide Hammer is a diamond level hammer that let's me mine a 3x3 area at a time.
The Tungsten-Carbide Excavator is a shovel that let's me dig a 3x3 area at a time.$(br2)Both of these tools sure make mining a lot more efficient and might I say, Fun!
